item.title: Vegan 'steaks' made with 3-D printer for 'conscious carnivores'...
item.description:
local12.com
LONDON (CBS) - A Spanish company wants to fill the world with 'conscious carnivores' one steak at a time. The company relies on 3-D printers to make their meat stand out. "It's an innovative entree that goes from printer to pan," said Giuseppe Scionti, founder of Nova Meat. Scionti came up with the idea two years ago. Since then, he's been printing and preparing vegan steaks like this for people around the world''It's about new meat, it means plant-based meat substitutes.
